title: A New Champ Idea
body:
we have so many champs but i will like to have one that i will create it its name will be Scythe 
is a jungler
Q- Passive Next 3 Special attacks will deal extra lifesteal + Attack Damage
W- Activate Scythe will be able to slice multiple enemies at a certain vicinty dealing Attack Damage
E- Activate Able to knock up enemies for some  time
R- Only can be activated when airborne pull out hidden blade with lights able to kill enemies that are in the air dash through an enemy 1 by 1 

an AD champ able to play AP 
is kinda like karthus {{champion:30}}

replies.body: This is a champ cross between Yasuo and Aatrox but worse. Not a very thought out champion idea my dude.
The ultimate is an obvious Yasuo rip off
i would probably change it to not a airborne attack
